Koga Shuko/Anubis/Hades/Unitron:


Anubis and Hades each stepped into a CR chamber, letting the internal and 
outer healing process begin.

=========================

A door slid up, Unitron stepping into the room, the room being the bridge.  
Sitting down on a computer console, he began to boost the defenses, and 
activate hidden solar panels atop the ship.

========================

Koga Shuko stepped into the lab.  In the center of the room was a circular 
object, a crystaline looking shape 10 ft high going upwards, 6 feet wide.  
Opening a small panel in the circular object Koga placed the fang in.  
Pressing a few buttons on the side, he laughed.  "I'll be back in a dozen 
cycles or so to check up on you." Shuko said, going to his quarters, getting 
in his private CR chamber, letting his mind wander off as he was being slowly 
repaired (though he really didn't need repairs).
